faq.question: What is the return policy?
faq.answer: We offer a 30-day return policy for all items in original condition. Items must be unused and in their original packaging. Shipping costs for returns are covered by the customer unless the item is defective.

faq.question: How long does shipping take?
faq.answer: Standard shipping takes 5-7 business days. Express shipping (2-3 business days) and overnight shipping are also available for an additional fee.

faq.question: Do you ship internationally?
faq.answer: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping typically takes 10-14 business days. Additional customs fees may apply.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. All transactions are secure and encrypted.

faq.question: How do I track my order?
faq.answer: Once your order ships, you'll receive an email with a tracking number. You can also track your order by logging into your account on our website.

policies.content: By using our website, you agree to these terms. We reserve the right to modify prices and availability. All sales are final after 30 days. Misuse of our platform may result in account termination.

policies.title: Warranty Policy
policies.summary: Product warranty information and claim process.
policies.content: All products come with a 1-year manufacturer's warranty against defects. This does not cover normal wear and tear or damage from misuse. To make a warranty claim, contact our support team with your order number and photos of the defect.
